title: Secret Society Members in Full Panic: Gowdy Has an INFORMANT!
plain_content:
The tide has turned against the “Deep State” that sought to execute a soft coup d’etat against a duly elected President of the United States. There is still much danger and battles which must be prosecuted to the end, but the power of secrecy has been ripped away from the conspirators.

Thanks go to Trey Gowdy and the Republicans who have finally decided to take the gloves off and fight for the Constitution. The plotters are frantically trying to hide after this development. This week the Republicans released a BOMBSHELL: they have an informant who knows all about a “Deep State” SECRET SOCIETY. It sounds like a script from some B Hollywood movie but it’s not. The details are shocking even for jaded politicians.

Here’s a video summarizing the shocking development:

.@SenRonJohnson on alleged ‘secret society’ mentioned in @FBI agents’ texts: “That ‘secret society’ – we have an informant that’s talking about a group, they were holding secret meetings offsite.” #SpecialReport https://t.co/0NPVFhqWiY pic.twitter.com/NaXelnfaJP

— Fox News (@FoxNews) January 23, 2018

Now the cockroaches like Comey and Strzok are frantically lawyering up. They seem to have grabbed the tiger by his tail.

Nevertheless, obviously this is an ominous development. For the worlds top law enforcement agency, the FBI, to be involved with an effort to remove the President of the United States from office is devastating. This shows how thoroughly the liberal ideology has seeped into every institution. Who can Americans trust now? Unfortunately this is not the whole picture. According to reports, the secret society includes members of all the intelligence agencies, the State Department, the Justice Department and the judiciary.

Never since the beginning of our country has there been such a dangerous threat. America will never fall to an outside enemy. But who knows what could happen as a result of treason at the highest levels. Pray for President Trump. Pray for the Republicans who are trying to unravel this.
